Objective.expression: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('ItchyAndScratchyLandGate')); if(isNULL(object)) { return 0; } var bonus = Building::getArrangeBonus(object); return bonus;

Requirement.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('ItchyAndScratchyLandGate')); if(isNULL(object)) { return false; } return Building::isBuildingInArrangeBonus('LogRideCliff', object)
